nytimes.title: After Harper Lee Novel Surfaces, Plots Arise
nytimes.topComment: I must say, I am saddened by many of the responses quoted in the article. As one who spends quite a bit of time with an aging family member, I find the comments and suppositions disheartening. While Ms. Lee is indeed aging, and requires assistance to...

nytimes.title: DealBook: Consumer Protection Agency Seeks Limits on Payday Lenders
nytimes.topComment:
The wealthy among us are investing their surplus income in credit products that take advantage of the financially desperate. They do this to obtain higher growth rates for their capital.
